channel.title: Comments on: Red + green + blue = something else

item.title: By: jerome
item.dc:creator: jerome
item.description: Hi Alex and congrats for your win! yes it is size of the mark that does it, though other things work (like filters for some values).
item.content:encoded:
Hi Alex and congrats for your win!
yes it is size of the mark that does it, though other things work (like filters for some values).

item.title: By: Alex Kerin
item.dc:creator: Alex Kerin
item.description: Jerome, love it. Is it the size of the pixel that is giving the effect? Or do you have a custom color scale for each layer?
item.content:encoded: Jerome, love it. Is it the size of the pixel that is giving the effect? Or do you have a custom color scale for each layer?
